alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 11:59PM CST until January 04 at 12:45AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 1245 AM CST. * At 1159 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Lisman, or 10 miles west of Butler, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Butler, Lisman and Pennington. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for southwestern Alabama.
